actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-1160.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 226 - 124 (Record Vote No: 460).

official_title: A resolution providing for a motion to take the bill (H.R. 4230) to extend the authorities under the Export Administration Act of 1979, from the Speaker's table and to agree to the Senate amendment with an amendment.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4230 (export administration) and the Senate amendment thereto.

titles.title: A resolution providing for a motion to take the bill (H.R. 4230) to extend the authorities under the Export Administration Act of 1979, from the Speaker's table and to agree to the Senate amendment with an amendment.
